      • getSubHash

        public static java.nio.ByteBuffer getSubHash(Hash hash,
                                             int length)
        Used to create low-memory index keys.
        Parameters:
        hash - the hash we create the key from
        length - the length of the desired subhash
        Returns:
        a ByteBuffer that holds a subarray of Indexable.bytes() that has the specified length
